ch.lambdaj.function.aggregate

Interface Aggregator<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Avg, Chooser, ChooserOnArgument, Concat, InitializedPairAggregator, Max, MaxOnArgument, Min, MinOnArgument, PairAggregator, Sum, SumDouble, SumInteger, SumLong

    public interface Aggregator<T>
    Defines an aggregation operation, i.e. how to aggregate the items of a collection.
    Author:
    Mario Fusco

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T aggregate(Iterator<? extends T> iterator)
      Defines how this operation aggregates a list of objects

    • Method Detail

      • aggregate

        T aggregate(Iterator<? extends T> iterator)
        Defines how this operation aggregates a list of objects
        Parameters:
        iterator - The objects to be aggregated
        Returns:
        The aggregation of the objects
